greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n shows the coefficients of the characteristic polynomial of the n-th principal submatrix of min(2i-1,2j-1) (A157454).
comment: Let p(n)=p(n,x) be the characteristic polynomial of the n-th principal submatrix.  The zeros of p(n) are real, and they interlace the zeros of p(n+1).  See A202605 and A204016 for guides to related sequences.
reference: (For references regarding interlacing roots, see A202605.)
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Morgan-Voyce polynomials
formula: Triangle appears to be a signed version of the row reverse of A211957.

If true, then for 0 <= k <= n-1, T(n,k) = (-1)^k*n/(n-k)*2^(n-k-1)*binomial(2*n-k-1,k) and sum {k = 0..n} T(n,k)*x^(n-k) = 1/2*(-1)^n*(b(2*n,-2*x) + 1)/b(n,-2*x), where b(n,x) := sum {k = 0..n} binomial(n+k,2*k)*x^k are the Morgan-Voyce polynomials of A085478.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jan 11 2012
